jobs.description: An array of Job objects that define the tasks to be executed.

name.description: A string that represents the name of the job.

description.description: An optional string that provides a description of the job.

disabled.description: An optional boolean that indicates whether the job is disabled or not.

tasks.description: An array of Task objects that define the tasks to be executed as part of the job.

schedulers.description: An array of Scheduler objects that define the scheduling configuration for the job.

hooks.description: An optional Hooks object that defines the hooks to be executed before or after the job.

done.description: An array of Task objects that define the tasks to be executed when the job is completed successfully.

failed.description: An array of Task objects that define the tasks to be executed when the job fails.

cron.description: A string that represents the cron expression that defines the scheduling frequency.

interval.description: A string that represents the interval at which the job should be executed.

on_init.description: Indicates that the job should trigger its tasks once initialized.

command.description: A string that represents the command to be executed.

retries.description: An integer that represents the number of times the task should be retried in case of failure.

retry-delay.description: A string that represents the delay between retries.

timeout.description: A string that represents the timeout for the task.

working_directory.description: A string that represents the working directory for the task.

env.description: An Env object that defines the environment variables for the task.

get.description: A string that represents the URL to be fetched using the GET method.

headers.description: An array of Header objects that define the headers to be sent with the request.

post.description: A string that represents the URL to be sent using the POST method.

data.description: A Data object that defines the data to be sent with the request.
